text: The 1996 Chicago Cubs season was the 125th season of the Chicago Cubs franchise, the 121st in the National League and the 81st at Wrigley Field. The Cubs finished fourth in the National League Central with a record of 76–86. ==Offseason== *March 9, 1996: Kent Bottenfield was signed as a Free Agent with the Chicago
